detail_desc: Classic T-shirt in soft, printed jersey.
Striped dress in soft, fine-knit cotton with buttons on one shoulder, front pockets, short sleeves with roll edges and a ribbed neckline. Unlined.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with a high elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and elasticated hems. Soft brushed inside.

Ankle-length joggers in soft, stretch cotton denim with elastication at the back of the waist and a zip fly and button. Side pockets, flap leg pockets with a hook and loop fastening and gently tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Hi-tops with an adjustable hook and loop tab, elasticated lacing and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Neat sports bag in a quilted weave with two handles that can be hung over the shoulder. Elasticated drawstring at the top and an open inner compartment. Lined in taffeta made from recycled polyester. Depth 6 cm. Width 40 cm. Height 45 cm.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sleeveless blouse in a crinkled viscose weave with a V-neck opening, buttons down the front, gathered yoke and rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Suede court shoes with pointed toes, leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 5.5 cm.
Fine-knit socks in soft chenille yarn with elasticated tops.

prod_name: ED Pixie PU trs stright leg
detail_desc: 5-pocket, ankle-length trousers in imitation leather with a high waist, zip fly and button and straight legs with seams just below the knees.
5-pocket, ankle-length trousers in soft, stretch twill with worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs.
5-pocket shorts in supersoft, stretch denim with adjustable elastication and a decorative drawstring at the waist, and a fake fly and button.
Short-sleeved top in soft jersey made from a viscose blend with a motif. Longer and rounded at the back.
Wide T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and hard-worn details on the front and sleeves.

Strapless bra in microfibre with underwired, padded cups that lift and shape the bust. Silicone trim at the top and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and side support.
Fine-knit trainer socks in fast-drying functional fabric.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a hood and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs.
Straight-cut coat woven in a wool blend that finishes just above the knees. High stand-up collar, concealed press-studs down the front, pockets in the side seams and a single back vent. Lined.
Imitation suede sandals with a small platform and covered heels. Thin straps around the top and a metal buckle at one side. Imitation leather insoles. Platform front 1 cm. Heel 9 cm.
T-shirt in nepped cotton jersey with embroidery.

Twill suit trousers containing some wool with a regular waist and pleats at the top. Extended waistband with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and a zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets and tapered legs with turn-ups. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Knee-length shorts in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and front and back pockets.
Backpack in grained imitation leather with a drawstring at the top and a flap with a handle and snap lock fastener. Lined. Height 35 cm. Width 29 cm. Depth 15 cm.
Skirt in soft, printed organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and seam at the hips with a wide flounce.
Short V-neck dress in a patterned viscose weave. Long puff sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a seam at the waist and gently flared skit. Lined front at the top.
Caps in cotton twill with a cotton sweatband and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back. One cap with an all-over print, one in a solid colour and one with a small appliqué on the front.
Tiered skirt in soft, printed organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Short dress in a crêpe weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck and short sleeves. Rubber print and scalloped edges around the sleeves and hem. Unlined.
Small bag in embossed suede with a metal chain shoulder strap and flap with a magnetic fastener. Lined. Size 8x11x14 cm.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cardigan in a fine-knit cotton and recycled polyester blend with a ribbed collar and button band with matt press-studs down the front. Open chest pocket.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, textured-knit cotton with stripes in different stitches and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cardigan in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Large bucket bag in imitation leather with two handles and a drawstring at the top and a detachable shoulder strap with carabiner hooks. Unlined. Size approx. 15x29.5x31.5 cm.
5-pocket skinny-fit trousers in washed, stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Slim-fit joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and stripes down the sides of the legs.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with long raglan sleeves, ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and medium coverage at the back.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated waist and 3/4-length legs.
Ankle-length trousers in stretch cotton corduroy with a high waist, zip fly and button, front and back pockets and slim legs.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Leggings in heavy, organic cotton jersey with a soft brushed inside. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.
Swim top with patterned sections, a small stand-up collar, long raglan sleeves and an elasticated hem.
Jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details, a fake fly, front and back pockets and slightly wider, tapered legs. Wide jersey ribbing at the waist for best fit.
Fabric-covered, steel wire hairband that can be opened out and tied in different ways. Length approx. 74 cm.
Chinos in cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly, side pockets, a fake back pocket with a button and slim legs.
High-waisted, ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric. Wide panel to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Short-sleeved nursing tops in organic cotton jersey with a wrapover front and practical inner top for easier nursing access.

Fully lined sports bra in extra-sturdy, fast-drying functional fabric that shapes and sculpts the bust. Removable inserts, a racer back and a wide, double-layered hem with a scalloped edge. Extra firm support.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Slides with an adjustable strap and buckle over the foot. Imitation leather linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Earrings in plastic with leaf-shaped pendants. Length 8.5 cm.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Fine-knit jumper in soft cashmere with a ribbed polo neck and long raglan sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Straight hem with slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Short shorts in a Tencel™ lyocell weave with a high, elasticated waist with a sewn-on tie belt. Zip fly with a concealed fastening and patch side pockets.

Block-coloured windbreaker in woven fabric with a high collar and lined, detachable hood with a hook and loop strap. Zip down the front with a chin guard, welt side pockets with a hook and loop fastening, and narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Gently tailored jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, a button at the front, welt front pockets with a flap, and a single back vent. Lined.
Shorts in printed sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with wide, elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist, and pockets in the side seams. The cotton content of the shorts is organic.
Leggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist and openings at the knees.
5-pocket skirt in washed denim with hard-worn details, a high waist, zip fly and button, and a frayed, raw-edge hem.
Sun hat in a cotton weave with ties under the chin. Lined. Width of brim 4.5 cm.
Slim-fit joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and stripes down the sides in a contrasting colour.

Oversized, knee-length top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, dropped shoulders and gathered ribbing at the cuffs. Decorative embroidery at the front and a kangaroo pocket. Soft brushed inside.
Long cardigan in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, ribbed bands, patch front pockets and a ribbed hem. No fasteners.
Jumper in a soft fine knit with gathers in the sides for best fit. V-neck with a visible lace trim at the front, 3/4-length, lace-trimmed sleeves and a detachable tie belt.
Loafers with tassels and a moccasin seam at the front. Leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel approx. 3 cm.
Short-sleeved top in ribbed organic cotton jersey with a stand-up collar and half-zip at the top with a round pull.
5-pocket, low-rise jeans in washed stretch twill with hard-worn details, a button fly and skinny legs with a zip at the hems.
High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and super-skinny legs.
Tube scarf in faux fur with a twisted detail at the front.

Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details. High waist with wide, elasticated ribbing. The tights are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Pile-lined jacket in imitation suede with raw edges. Collar, diagonal zip down the front, zipped side pockets and a zip at the cuffs.
Long sparkly stone earrings. Length approx. 12.5 cm.

Kangol x H&M. Oversized jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a jacquard-knit Kangol kangaroo. Ribbed polo neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Short shorts in a viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and gently rounded hems with short slits in the sides.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, an open back pocket and raw, roll-edge hems.
Leggings in stretch imitation leather with a high, elasticated waist and slim legs.
